Header: Indian Navy Ship Yamuna in the Galle Harbor
Content: The Indian Navy Ship Yamuna arrived at the Galle harbor.The Indian Navy Ship Yamuna arrived at the Colombo harbor with the aim of taking part in a joint program to map Sri Lankaâ€™s maritime boundaries. The Yamuna Ship which conducted surveys from Colombo to Galle and thereafter arrived at Galle harbor. Sri Lank Navy welcomed the ship according to Navy traditions. A meeting took place between the Commanding Officer of Yamuna ship Captain H.A. Hardous and Rear Admiral Kapila Samaraweera.
